title: Windows 7 Add-On Pack. Bring back Network Indictor and Sidebar s
description:
Windows 7 Add-on Patch.. to replace some of the missing things from
XP_vista.. also see windows 8 add-on pack which has a few more things
that also work on windows 7 like tera copier and Classic Shell

if want to scroll your sidebar gadgets theres a add-on gadget that does it npw
and the most MISSED network ICON is back. run it
and right click tray icon for options.. like start with windows
or can manually start each time.

I think the network indictor and sidebar 7 also work fine in windows 8



Help Seed if grabbing cheers.. I have limited data cap and speed
